horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: A New Moon in Capricorn will activate your tenth house, influencing your professional sphere. This period encourages the initiation of a new career chapter. The moon's growth in the coming days suggests positive development and progress. Your career responsibilities are likely to expand, and superiors will observe your contributions, potentially leading to greater recognition. This lunar event signifies new beginnings, which could bring new projects, changes in management, or a different professional environment. The New Moon promotes a greater emphasis on accountability, discipline, and clear achievements within your career.

On the nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in Taurus, and it will produce progressive changes regarding finances, and your family life. Uranus is the planet for sudden changes, so do during this day, you can expect important information in an unexpected manner, which can immediately alter your financial professional or material plans. For Aries Sun, Moon and rising sign natives will have a lot of communication like salary negotiations, interviews or planning for new investment plans too. You can also expect sudden expenses, so you need to be prepared for that.

During this week the Sun and Mars will enter Aquarius, and Venus is already there, so you will be ambitious and hopeful about your future. The last few days were a bit complex due to the challenges in the personal life and work. When the Sun and Moon move to your eleventh house, you will get new opportunities for joining new organisations, and you may even get new friends in the personal life. There will be online and offline meetings, which will bring measurable results than mere discussions. However, Sun and Mars can bring frictions between team mates, as the Sun and Mars are separatists planets, so you need to be careful with your team mates.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The first new moon of this year will rise in the earth sign of Capricorn, and this new moon will bring some shifts in your belief system, education and higher studies. This new moon will bring long distance travels, foreign collaborations and discussions about immigration. Those who work in teaching, writing and publishing will get new projects, as the new moon indicates new beginnings. There will be some guidance from the mentors, gurus and authoritative figures, and those inputs will be very valid. The Moon will aspect the third house, so there will be a lot of communication with your siblings, and people around you. If you were trying to learn a new course such opportunities will come in the next six months.

On the nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in Taurus, so this will be a very significant day for you as there will a sudden event during this day, which will be very positive. It can be like you getting a new project, you taking a beauty treatment, or you will get a new friend when you least expect it as Uranus indicates sudden events. Uranus is known as a rebel planet, so you will try to break the boundaries set by yourself, and that will help you to see the world in a new perspective.

Venus is already in Aquarius, and during this week, the Sun and Mars also will be in Aquarius, so the tenth house of career will be highly active. Three planets in the tenth house shows, you will have some significant events at work , like getting a new job, new work device or you can even get a new project. The Sun will be here for the next thirty days, so you have a long duration of time to make your career more productive. However, the Sun and Mars are separatist planet, so there are chances for some arguments with your managers too.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The first new moon of this year will rise in the earth sign of Capricorn, which rules your eighth house of sudden events and finances. The New moon indicates new beginnings, so you can expect new events connected to joint finances, tax, insurance, and inheritances. The new moon will bring new financial dependencies and some of them will get restructured, and there are can also be some argument regarding joint assets. The eighth house indicates secrets regarding finances and relationship will rise to the surface. For the next six months, there are huge chances to take loans, new insurance or repay some loans too.

On the nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in Taurus, so this will bring a sudden event regarding your emotional needs. During this week, your primary focus will be in spiritual matters, and healing as Taurus rules your twelfth house. There will be some developments in your private life, like you getting a confidential news through messages, documents, or conversations. Some of your personal issues also will get solved during this time. The twelfth house indicates isolation, so you will feel like being a bit lonely, but there is nothing wrong in that. You will also be visiting someone who live in private places or isolated places too.

The Sun and Mars will move to the ninth house during this week, and they will remain there for a long phase. This will bring foreign collaborations, long trips, and communication with an international community. This is a great phase for learning, so you will get multiple chances for learning new courses, taking part in some competitions, and writing some exams. Since Venus is also there, you will have a good experience in all these and additionally, you will get enough support from your mentors, gurus and fatherly figures too.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: For Cancer Sun, Moon and rising signs, the relationships are going to transform as the new moon will rise in the earth sign of Capricorn. The new moon indicates new beginnings, so you will have new opportunities arising from business relationships, like new agreements, contracts or even a new job opportunity. The impact of the new moon will last for the next six months, so you have a long phase of time to get such opportunities. This new moon also will bring significant changes in your love life as well. If you are a single, there will be many chances to meet like minded person, and if you are a married person, your relationship will improve in the coming days.

On the nineteenth Mercury will trine Uranus in Taurus, which will bring important developments in the long term goals, and collective projects. This harmonious aspect will bring positive long term projects or you will research the possibilities of such projects during this week. There will be some updates about your pending long term projects too, and they will be positive. You will surely meet a new person during this week through social platforms, technological discussions or charity activities. During this week, you will set some plans for team venture as well.

Venus is in Aquarius and during this week, the Sun, and Mars also will enter this air sign, so you will have some financial obligations and deep commitments in the coming days. Mars will be here for the next forty plus days, and you have to be very careful with the financial matters, your reputation and your partnerships too. Mars itself is the planet for financial liabilities so, you will have to spend each penny carefully, otherwise there will be issues for a long term. You will discuss the possibilities of financial projects, loans, tax and insurance too.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The first new moon of this year will rise in the earth sign of Capricorn, and it will impact your sixth house of work, financial liabilities and health. This new moon will bring new job opportunities, or some changes at work like a new task, new project, or work routine will begin and it will require immediate attention. The impact of the new moon will last for the next six months, so you can expect such changes until then. This is a very good time to apply for a new job, or start a new project, or you will even get a new colleague. Your health also will be very important, as there are chances for minor abdominal issues.

On the nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in your tenth house, so career will again get highlighted during this week. This is a very harmonious aspect and it will bring sudden events at work, like a new project, or a new event like your manager giving you a new task. There will be some important emails, calls, or announcements related to work, and they will arrive quickly with immediate outcomes, so you should be prepared for that. There will be important meetings with supervisors, clients or authority figures too.

Three planets, the Sun, Mars and Venus will be in Aquarius so, your seventh house of personal and professional relationships will be very important. The seventh house indicates love life and marriage, so there will be a focus on those things, and you should be careful as this is a complex transit. The Sun and Mars are malefics, and Venus is a benefic, so you can expect good as well as a bit tough situation regarding your personal relationships. There are chances to get new business deals, contracts and opportunities for negotiations as well. Social gatherings, and foreign collaborations also will be the part of this transit.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The new moon will rise in the earth sign of Capricorn during this week; this is the first new moon of this year. This positive cosmic event will trigger the fun part in your life, so you will go out, make friends and attend some social gatherings. This is a very special transit for those who have own business or someone who plan to have own ventures, as the new moon will bring new business ideas. Some of you will launch their brand, or promote them and the public will give immense support. Parents will have closer communication with children, and singles will start dating in the next six months.

On nineteenth Mercury will trine Uranus in Taurus, so there are chances for sudden long trips or foreign travels. This harmonious event will bring positive news and updates about your foreign collaborations, if you were working on such projects. You can expect important emails, calls, or documents connected to the universities, institutions, courts or visas during this week. If you were expecting some announcements regarding the final date of applications, exams, or other announcements, then you can expect that during this week. Those who work in publishing, media, and teaching related domain, they will have more work.

The Sun and Mars will enter Aquarius and Venus is already there, so your daily life will become very hectic, as you have a lot of work, which will be very demanding. Job duties will expand and new responsibilities will surely come up and they will be very complex too. Since the Sun and Mars are malefics, there are chances for heated arguments at work with your colleagues, which can ruin the workplace relationships, so you must stay away from them. The lower abdomen area is also a bit sensitive so you should have a good diet.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The first new moon of this year will rise in the fourth house of home and family, so you can expect new events at home. The impact of the new moon will last for the next six months, so you will have events like relocation, a move or significant events at home in the coming days. You will also discuss the possibilities of property transactions, such as buying, selling, renting or leasing the property. Your family responsibility will surely increase, and it can majorly happen through caring for the elders, some house hold decisions, or conducting some family functions too. Domestic routines will change, and new structures will get established in the next six months.

On nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in the eighth house of finances, so you will get some updates about your financial liabilities. You will be forced to take rapid decisions, as some unexpected financial needs will be arising on this dat. You will also try to get some loans or pay back some loans, or restructure your tax, PF, and insurance. There will be conversations with banks, partners and legal representatives too. You will be interested in spiritual and healing practices too.

During this week, the Sun and Mars will move into the air sign of Aquarius, which will bring some creative projects, as they both will trigger the fifth house. Since Venus is also here, your creative skills will increase and people will surely notice that. There will be progress in the relationships, but there will be some arguments as the Sun and Mars are natural malefics, and they can act hostile. You will start working in new creative projects, and this should be careful as sometimes, you can get into huge losses. Children and youngsters will be the part of the life, as there will be more interaction with them.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: You are going to be very busy this week, as the first new moon of this year will be rising in the earth sign of Capricorn during this week. The impact of the new moon will last for the next six months, so get ready to run around. This new moon will start a new cycle of communication, movement, and daily activities. You will have to communicate with a lot of people, including your siblings, friends and neighbouring community. There will be new projects from writing, speaking, studying, marketing or social media. There will be online and offline meetings, short trips and you may buy new electronic devices too.

Mercury will trine Uranus in the seventh house on nineteenth, and this impact will be visible during this week. This harmonious cosmic event has the potential to bring harmony in the relationship, so this is a good week to solve your relationship issues. Uranus is the planet of rebellion, so you will come out of the box ideas to find a new person in your life. This relationship can come up from personal or business domain, so, there is a positive chance to get a progressive relationship too. You will also go for social gatherings, parties and business meets.

The Sun and Mars will move into the air sign of Aquarius, and Venus is already there, so you will focus more on your home and family. These planets will be in the fourth house for a long time, so you are entering an outcome-driven phase. Your domestic responsibilities will increase, so you need to handle them very carefully, as there are chances for flaws as the Sun and Mars are malefics. There will be family discussions regarding the elderly members and family property as well. You can also expect occasions like work from home scenario too.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The first new moon of this year will rise in the earth sign of Capricorn, so you will start a new financial cycle, and there will be progress in the income. The impact of the new moon will last for the next six months, so in this long duration, Scorpio Sun, Moon and rising signs will have the opportunity to get a new job, or a contract job. In the next six months, you will have discussions regarding salary, payment structures, or pricing adjustments, so your focus will be totally on the financial part. There are chances for some treatment in the facial area.

On the nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus, and this harmonious trine will bring better atmosphere at work, and you will be able to work with precision. Uranus is known as the rebel of the zodiac, so you will get out of the box ideas to bring more perfection at your work. This trine will also bring new tasks, new projects, or job seekers can also expect a new job. The food intake is very important as the sixth house indicates lower abdomen, so you will have the feeling to consume all junk, which can bring digestive issues.

The Sun and Mars will move into the air sign of Aquarius, which will impact your third house, and Venus is already there. You will have a lot of conversations for personal and business purpose, which can lead to some conclusions. There will be a lot of short messages, emails, phone calls, documentation, and they will require constant attention, which will result in completed arrangements. You can also expect meetings, interviews, short trips, and study programs as well. This transit also can bring transfer or inter department transfer related opportunities too. Your siblings, neighbours, and network communities will have more activity with you.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The first new moon of this year will rise in your sign, and the new moon indicates freshness, changes and new events. The impact of the new moon will last for the next six months, till that period, your life will be transforming heavily. Your appearance, personal life, and social presence also will be changing steadily, and that will surely boost your image. This is a powerful time to reset your life, and there will be visible new beginnings in your life. You will be surely getting some leadership role at home or work, so get ready to embrace the changes given by the universe.

On nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in Taurus, which will impact the fifth house, so you can expect sudden development like sudden team change, new business ideas, or new love life too. Uranus will bring out of the box business ideas, but you should not be in a hurry to invest huge amount in such ventures. You will also attend social gatherings, and meet new friends, and single Capricorn natives will get the closest opportunities to find someone special. Parents will be closer with the children, and there will be some updates about their personal and professional life.

After the new moon, the Sun and Mars will move into the second house, and Venus is also there. These three planets will bring significant developments in the finances and income, so this is an outcome-driven phase. Whenever the second house is activated, there will be chances for salary based discussions, negotiations and new job contracts too, so from various angles this is seen as a promising week for job seekers. You will also have major purchases, involving valuables, property, technology or lifestyle upgrades. There will be some plans to start new investment plans like taking a new insurance plan, or a new bank account too.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: During this week, the new moon will rise in Capricorn, which will impact your twelfth house of isolation, and detachment. This new moon will bring some private developments, so you will be dealing with some private issues with the support of your trusted people. The twelfth house indicates isolation and detachment, so you will have some emotional reasons to stay away from the madding crowd, and you want peace. You will also visit someone in the hospital or who lives in the isolated places, which can be an emotional event too, so you need to handle the situation carefully. This Moon will bring complex dreams, which will send some signals about your future.

On the nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in your fourth house, so there will be some important updates about family members. This transit will bring some visitors from the foreign lands. There will be sudden changes in your family environment like real estate deals, house shifting, relocation, renovation or some domestic changes. You will also have some important conversations with family members about a complex situation. This trine can have an impact on the workplace, so you can expect a sudden job opportunity or change in an ongoing project too.

The Sun and Mars will come into your sign and Venus is also there, so, this is a good as well as complex time for you. When three planets move through your sign, you will feel that you have some pending tasks but may not have a clear idea on what they are. You will take charge of the situation, and make firm decisions about your direction, identity, and priorities. There will be changes in the appearance, lifestyle, or behaviour as your soul sees that this is the time for transformation. You will also attend some public functions, where you meet new people.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting January 18
content: The first new moon of this year will rise in the earth sign of Capricorn, and that will trigger your eleventh house of long term plans and collective projects. The new moon indicates new beginnings, so, you can expect new long term associations, and new friendships. New connections will come through online and offline mode, professional communities and charity ventures too. The impact of the new moon will last for the next six months, so you have ample time to plan for your long term projects. If you are a job seeker, then you will get many opportunities to join a new firm too.

On nineteenth, Mercury will trine Uranus in the third house, and that shows that you will be busy and multitasking, as the third house indicates multitasking. You will get some updates about your projects, and you will get some out of the box ideas to make them work. There will be multiple online and offline meetings, interviews or short trips, so this is definitely going to be a very busy week, and you can be a bit tired too. The third house indicates writing, teaching, preaching and learning, so such opportunities also will be plenty. Those who were looking for transfer or inter department transfer will get such opportunities.

The Sun and Mars will move to Aquarius this week, and Venus is also there, but this is a bit complex transit as the Sun or Mars doesn’t like to be here, as this is the darkest portion of this horoscope. There will be some emotional hurdles, and you have to manage them carefully, otherwise it can affect you badly. This transit will make you think about spiritual matters, and you will go to attend rituals, prayer meetings, or you will read spiritual texts. You will also get some updates from the foreign lands about long trips or settlements.
